QAPair.Question: Do you have information about Meniscus tears - aftercare
QAPair.Answer: The meniscus is a c-shaped piece of cartilage in your knee joint. You have two in each knee. Meniscus cartilage is a tough but flexible tissue that acts as a cushion between the ends of bones in a joint., Meniscus tears refer to tears in this shock-absorbing cartilage of the knee.,
